attributes.action: Change the way Barclays Bank deal with the Romanian customers
attributes.background: To accept the Romanian ID in the equal standards that they accept all other EU ID cards. And to deal with customers from a different nationality with respect and understanding.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Barclays Bank, not the UK Government or Parliament. You could try contacting the bank directly about this issue: https://www.barclays.co.uk/help/customer-services/contact_service/
